subject: Self Care
title: Work-Life Integration
description: Learn Work-Life Integration in one minute.

hook.text: Work-life balance implies a scale. One side always wins. Integration means designing a life where both coexist well.

buildup.text: Integration means aligning work and personal life around shared values instead of keeping them in rigid silos.

discovery.text: Flexible schedules, meaningful work, and personal boundaries create integration. It's architecture, not luck.

twist.text: Integration requires saying no to opportunities that conflict with your whole-life design â€” even lucrative ones.

climax.text: Design your ideal week: blocks for work, rest, connection, and play. Then negotiate your life toward that design.

punchline.text: Balance is a myth. Integration is a design. Build yours.

quiz.question: How does work-life integration differ from work-life balance?
options: Integration aligns both around values instead of keeping rigid silos
